docs.text: SSH into a Sambot Please note that these instructions are for MacOS or Ubuntu systems only. For Windows, you will need to install PuTTY or similar software. Make sure both the robot and your computer are on the same WiFi network. Follow instructions on this page Find the robot's IP address on the small screen of the robot. Let's assume that is 192.168.0.103 . Open a terminal window on your computer. Enter the following commands ssh jetbot@192.168.0.103 . Then enter the robot's password. Now you have successfully SSH'd into the robot.
docs.title: Resources

docs.text: Please note that these instructions are for MacOS or Ubuntu systems only. For Windows, you will need to install PuTTY or similar software. Make sure both the robot and your computer are on the same WiFi network. Follow instructions on this page Find the robot's IP address on the small screen of the robot. Let's assume that is 192.168.0.103 . Open a terminal window on your computer. Enter the following commands ssh jetbot@192.168.0.103 . Then enter the robot's password. Now you have successfully SSH'd into the robot.
docs.title: SSH into a Sambot
